ray.medium

Class HomogeneousMedium

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.medium.BoundedMedium
      • ray.medium.HomogeneousMedium
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Medium

    public class HomogeneousMedium
extends BoundedMedium
    Author:
    srm A medium in which the interaction coefficients and the phase function are constant.

      • attenuation

        public void attenuation(Ray ray,
                        Color outAttenuation)
        Description copied from interface: Medium
        Compute the attenuation through the medium between the ray's start and end points.
        Parameters:
        ray - The ray; the start and end times determine the relevant segment.
        outAttenuation - The attenuation.

      • properties

        public void properties(Point3 p,
                       MediumSamplingRecord volRec)
        Description copied from interface: Medium
        Query the medium's properties at a particular point.
        Parameters:
        p - The point in the medium to query.
        volRec - Record to store results; irrelevant fields are set to defaults.

      • selectDistance

        public boolean selectDistance(Ray ray,
                              double seed,
                              MediumSamplingRecord mRec)
        Description copied from interface: Medium
        Select a point along a ray segment by importance sampling the attenuation between the ray's start point and the chosen point.
        Parameters:
        ray - The ray along which to choose a point.
        seed - The importance sampling seed
        mRec - Record to store output
        Returns:
        True if a point was selected; false if we went past the end point.
